description:
• Are you thinking of learning to fly and obtaining your Private Pilot License but don't know what is involved in terms of cost, time and effort?
  • Have you already started the Private Pilot License process and are looking for tips, advice and resources to assist you on your way to earning your wings?
  • Are you preparing for any of the three Private Pilot License exams and want details on what to expect?

If you answer "yes" to one of the following questions then this course will be of interest to you.

Using recent personal experiences this course details what you need to know to get you started on the process to becoming a qualified FAA Private Pilot and what to expect from the main stages of the certification process.
title: Learn to fly: Obtaining an FAA Private Pilot License (PPL)
